title: Flint Bishop Airport to launch AI-powered parking system

title: ‘Almost every instructor is doing it’: How university professors are using AI, and why students are concerned
description: Students who spoke to CNA TODAY said that they accept the use of artificial intelligence tools for course preparation if professors are transparent, but oppose using it for grading.
content:
In response to CNA TODAY's queries, all six autonomous universities in Singapore said that they viewed artificial intelligence (AI) as a useful and transformative pedagogical tool that requires responsible use.
In general, the universities encourage ... [2732 chars]

title: Mornington Clinics Transform Pain Relief with AI Enhanced Massage Mornington
description: Mornington, Victoria, Sept. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mornington Peninsula Myotherapy & Massage has partnered with Massage Mornington Peninsula to create a new era in pain management. Both clinics are award winning and located in the heart of Mornington. Together they are bringing artificial intelligence into the traditional practice of massage. By blending therapist expertise with data driven insights, the two leaders in Massage Mornington are aiming to deliver longer lasting results and more accurate treatment for every client.

title: TSMC, Amkor partner with venture capital firm on startup accelerator
description: Amkor, TSMC and a venture capital firm are creating a hub for companies driving innovations in chip manufacturing and artificial intelligence.
content:

title: China's Huawei co-develops DeepSeek model, improves censoring
description: Chinese tech giant Huawei has co-developed a safety-focused version of artificial intelligence model DeepSeek that it said is "nearly 100% successful" in preventing discussion of politically sensitive topics.
content:
